accordion.title: What surgeries do you provide recovery for?
accordion.text: We provide recovery care after any elective surgery, specializing in plastic surgery.

accordion.title: What is included in the room rate?
accordion.text:
The room rate includes:

  • Stay of one guest, including a private bathroom and private outdoor area
  • 24/7 licensed nursing care
  • Upon physician's request, a Sequential Compression Device and/or Oxygen Concentrator
  • Recovery clothing
  • Transportation: pick-up after your surgery, all follow-up visits with your surgeon during your stay with us, drop-off after your stay (Los Angeles Metropolitan Area, including LAX.)
  • Post-op meals
  • Breakfasts and snacks during your stay

accordion.title: Can I stay with you before my surgery?
accordion.text: Of course you can! If you want to settle in your room before the surgery, staying with us the night before is a great choice. We will transport you to your surgery and back to your room afterward.

accordion.title: What should I bring with me for my stay?
accordion.text:
Bring whatever you usually pack for an overnight stay. We provide all the necessary toiletries and professional recovery wear for your visit. If you underwent facial surgery, consider bringing a large hat and a scarf for privacy during your transportation to follow-up appointments and back.

Please do not bring any valuables (cash, jewelry, etc.) Nest Recovery is not liable for any lost or damaged items during your stay.

accordion.title: What time is check-in and check-out?
accordion.text: Check-in time is any time after 2 pm. Check-out time is any time until 11 am. Early check-in or late check-out may be approved, subject to availability and extra fee.

accordion.title: What are the hours of operation at your facility?
What is your cancellation policy?
accordion.text:
We offer a 48-hour cancellation policy. If you want to cancel your stay, please call us 48 hours before the check-in time on your arrival date and we will refund the deposit in full. If we do not receive your 48-hour notice, unfortunately, we cannot refund the deposit for the first night of your stay.

If you need to change your visit dates, please call us as soon as possible, and we will do our best to accommodate your change.

accordion.title: May I have visitors? What are your visiting hours?
accordion.text: Of course! We heartily recommend that your friends and family visit you to support you during the recovery. We do not limit visiting hours; however, overnight guests are charged an extra fee of $300 per night (breakfast and snacks included.) Overnight guests will be provided with rollaway beds.

accordion.title: Where can I get lunch and dinner during my stay?
accordion.text:
Nest Recovery is located in the heart of Beverly Hills with a variety of restaurants in the area offering delivery via Uber Eats and other apps. Some of our favourites are:

  • Wally’s 
  • Cafe Roma
  • Polo Lounge
  • Ebaldi

accordion.title: I have more questions.
accordion.text: If you did not find an answer to your questions above, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are happy to provide you with any information you need.

cardBenefits.description: Spacious suites, each outfitted with modern amenities and private patios/outdoor access. Chef-prepared meals.

massage.title: Lymphatic drainage massage
massage.text:
If recommended by your doctor, we offer on-site lymphatic drainage massage, expertly administered by our skilled masseur, Vasil. With an impressive 20 years of experience, Vasil holds a degree in Kinesiology with a focus on exercise science from CSUN. He is currently completing his doctorate program at SCUHS, working towards earning the title of Dr. of Chiropractic this year.

Rate: $300/session
